{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=CS-E300 |revision=-K9 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U58O201T04 |manuf_rev=REV 03GP |est_release_date=September 2011 |type=media bridge, smart switch |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=CE4150 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=2 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F16G08ABABA |fla2=2 GiB |fla2_brand=Hynix |fla2_model=H27UAG8T2B2R |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M8DA-125:K |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1111 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6046 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Flash Controller;Phison Electronics;PS2251;;1;,,, 24-Bit,192-kHz Stereo DAC;Burr-Brown Products;PCM1755;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C and SMBus Expander;TI;TCA9539;;1;,,, 64K 16-Bit MCU;Microchip;PIC24FJ64GA;;1;,,, Single Channel USB Power Switch;TI;TPS2065;;3;,,, Single-Chip HDMI Transmitter Port Protection;TI;TPD12S521;;1;,,, 1.5A Ultra LDO Linear Regulator;TI;TPS74201;;1;,,, 800mA Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Burr-Brown Products;;2;,,, 35V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDD6637;;1;,,, Dual 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6982S;;1;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51124;;1;,,, System Clock w/Selectable DDR Frequency;IDT;6V49185PAG;;1;,,, PC Main Clock;IDT;9LPRS525AGLF;;1;,,, Low-Power, Low-Offset Voltage,Dual Comparator;TI;LM393;;2;,,, 256K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256;;1;,,, |flags=HDMI, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), |stock_os=Linux;2.6.28; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=cisco |oui_eth=1C:AA:07 }} {{TagLine|Cisco Edge 300 Series Switch}} :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/switches/edge-300-switch/model.html Product Page] [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/edge-300-series/data_sheet_c78-694183.html Datasheet]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: Intel Atom CE4150 @ 1.2GHz *GPU: Intel GMA500 *Memory: 2GB DDR3-1600 *Storage: 2GB SLC NAND Flash, 2GB MLC Flash *Network 1x Gigabit Ethernet, 4x Fast Ethernet *USB: 4x USB 2.0 *Power Source: 12V/5A via DC power
===See also=== *[[Cisco Edge 340 DMP (CS-E340W)]] (-M32-A-K9) - ''Digital Media Player'' • [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/video/edge-340-digital-media-player/datasheet-c78-732178.html DS] :● CPU: @1.60GHz (Dual-core) :● Memory: 2GB (DDR3 memory) :● Storage: 32GB (built-in SSD), one SD slot :(multi-level cell [MLC] SD card highly preferred)
